plot: A serial killer on a romantic date. The plan is like always. To seduce and kill the victim. But perhaps this time it will turn out different.
title: The Romantic Killer
plot_es: A serial killer on a romantic date. The plan is like always. To seduce and kill the victim. But perhaps this time it will turn out different.
plot_en: A serial killer on a romantic date. The plan is like always. To seduce and kill the victim. But perhaps this time it will turn out different.
